info.name: FF.net - Sepia + Ad Removal
info.description: Sepia FF.net adapted from NHansen's purple+black userstyle here. Not perfect, as I made it primarily for myself and I don't use some parts of the site, but I figured I'd share it for anyone interested!
info.additionalInfo: In Chrome at least, this style should be compatible with the userscripts Fanfiction Tools and FFNET Filters Auto-Select (possibly others as well, but these are the only ones I use). Palette based off of 'let them eat cake' on colourlovers.
